Title: The Ecstasy of Agony
Actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Alana De La Garza, Joel David Moore, Donnie Keshawarz
Plot: Henry and Jo become immersed in the world of a dominatrix, who doesn't dole out pain for kinky pleasures but for therapeutic purposes. Meanwhile, Abe reacquaints himself with his own form of pain and pleasure - his former wife.
